TopicTitle: To the point of no return

Articles.Content:
It started with lunacy. Lunar is Moon and the thought of going home there, which Kennedy expressed, is lunacy.

Go there to plant a flag like Kerbals get for missions, come on: it's really about needing a vacation, to get away from stress, noise etc in quiet space? Of course Neil Popeye and Franklin Roosevelt made Moon landing, but that's the point with arguing "there never was one", because nobody went home, it's lunacy.

It seems suicidal, because suicidals also want to escape, and be reasonable, .. what is out there???
Uh? Um? Huh? Im so confused...
But the Moon is their home, on the Earth they are just on vacation.

Lunacy is this: Trees with fruits, they throw them around, that's how weed exists with no purpose. Flowers lure bees with parfume to transport their whit. And the plant massproduce such, no purpose, really just an infernal copy routine of it's structure. [snip] We are enslaved thus, because it coerces to massproduce, an infernal copy routine in programming, which we now know of thanks to mighty rich Bill Gates - the greedy -. You imagine to like some one, hello, it's them jingle bells, that enslaves you thus to mass produce - to overpopulate, to invade other races and into space if ever, you figure that out too. Starting with Moon yes.

Thank you for your understanding.
Maybe even Earth is their real home?.. Who knows.
